thread1.user: Pitch Deck: EdTechX is transforming education with AI-powered personalized learning platforms. Our solution adapts to each student's unique needs, enabling effective and engaging learning experiences. With a target market of $10B in online education and a 12% annual growth rate, we focus on underserved students and institutions seeking cost-effective and scalable educational solutions. Our subscription-based revenue model includes a $50 monthly fee per student and enterprise packages for schools and universities.
